'Springs Christian Academy' is a private Christian school in Winnipeg, Manitoba.
It has two campuses. The first campus serves students from Nursery to Grade 6
and the second campus serves students from Grade 7 to Grade 12. The school was
founded in 1989 by Springs of Living Water Church (now Springs Church) in
Winnipeg. It has 650 students total.
